# Imperecta Landing Page - Robots.txt
# https://imperecta.com

User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemap
Sitemap: https://imperecta.com/sitemap.xml

# Disallow admin and private areas
Disallow: /admin/
Disallow: /private/
Disallow: /api/

# Allow important pages
Allow: /
Allow: /features
Allow: /pricing
Allow: /about
Allow: /contact

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1
